game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, a young apprentice named Eryndor Thorne discovers a mysterious ancient tome hidden deep within the ruins of a long-abandoned castle.
game.ending: As the darkness is vanquished, Eryndor becomes the new beacon of hope for the people, and with his newfound abilities, he sets out to rebuild the world and restore magic to its former glory.
game.synopsis: The story follows Eryndor's journey as he uncovers the secrets of the ancient tome, masters the long-lost art of magic, and battles against an evil sorceress who seeks to claim dominion over the land. Along the way, he must confront his own demons, form alliances with unlikely heroes, and make difficult choices that will shape the fate of the world.
game.title: The Lost Tome of Eldrador
